titleStmt.title: The book intytuled The art of good lywyng [and] good deyng
Art de bien vivre et de bien mourir. English.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Imprentyt in parys the. xx. day of the mowneth of May :

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Thomas Lewington, of the French original.
Place of publication from colophon; uniform title, printer's name and publication date from STC.
Some print show-through; imperfect: leaves a3,4 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
